import React, {Component} from 'react' import tether from "../../src/tether.png" import Airdrop from './Airdrop' class Main extends Component { render() { return (
Staking Balance Reward Balance
{(this.props.stakingBalance, 'ether')} USDT {(this.props.rwdBalance, 'ether')} RWD
{ event.preventDefault() let amount amount = this.input.value.toString() amount = window.web3.utils.toWei(amount, 'ether') this.props.stakeTokens(amount) }} className='mb-3'>
Balance: {(this.props.tetherBalance, 'ether')}
{this.input = input}} type='text' placeholder='0' required/>
  USDT
AIRDROP
) } } export default Main;
